alert.note: Alert for Independence; Jackson; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 12:10AM CDT until November 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Woodruff County in eastern Arkansas... Southeastern Independence County in north central Arkansas... Jackson County in eastern Arkansas... Eastern White County in central Arkansas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1209 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Steprock to near Higginson to near Thurman, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newport... Augusta... Tuckerman... Diaz... Swifton... Patterson... Grubbs... Russell... Jacksonport... Tupelo... Algoa... McCrory... McFadden... Hurricane Lake WMA... Pryor... Bradford... Campbell Station... Beedeville... Amagon... Weldon... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for eastern, central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for eastern, central and north central Arkansas.
